overview: Heavily influenced by true events of occupy movements and protests across the world over the past 3 years, The Lost Generation portrays a very entertaining yet relevant depiction of our current media and society. We are invited to follow reality TV star SJ - the inspirational female lead, on an epic fight for survival in a dystopian presentation of our present-day world.
tagline: The rules are simple; Kill your opponent, stay at the top of the leader board and win Â£10 million. Fail and you're dead.
title: The Lost Generation
